article:
A farmer carelessly lost an expensive gold watch in the barn  on the farm.So he put a(n)  _  on the gate of the farm: whoever finds the gold watch will be rewarded 100 dollars.
Facing the temptation  of the handsome  _  , people tried their best to look for it everywhere.
However, the grain was  _  like a hill along with lots of straw, so if they wanted to find the gold watch, it would
be like  _  for a needle in the ocean.
So they gave up one by one.Only a small boy in shabby clothes kept looking for it in the grain.He was  _  to find the gold watch and let his parents, brothers and sisters have a(n)  _  meal. It was late, and the boy was also tired. He was lying in the straw to have  _  when he heard a strange "tick-tock".
He  _  held his breath and listened attentively.It was quieter in the barn while "tick-tock" sounded clearly.The boy  _  the sound, found the gold watch  _  in the depths of the grain and finally got the 100 dotes.
Like the gold watch in the barn,  _  has existed around us and spread in every comer of life.Only when we are  _  and firmly look for it can we find it.
